column1: Little Goat Diner////Since I was overwhelmed with the selection
column2: I asked my server to bring me what he thought I should have. I tried this at the sister restaurant to phenomenal results. And I was smart to do so. The server brought me something I would not have ordered: Pork shoulder
column3: in a broth. It was amazing. I complimented that with a glass of wine from the limited by the glass wine menu. My companion ordered the goat burger
column4: which was well seasoned and perfectly cooked. Our sampling experience was limited to those items
column6: that sounded more special than they actually were.
